The post How to Exchange Volet (AdvCash) to Perfect Money [2024 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
If you need to exchange Volet (AdvCash) to Perfect Money, CoinCannon is the ultimate platform for the job. Volet (AdvCash) is one of the lesser known offshore payment provider that is efficient yet diverse.

For the most part, the transactions are cheap and fast and users have direct access to a wide variety of currencies. However, using an OTC exchange platform like CoinCannon can further expand the utility all while providing improved privacy.

Today, we will go over how to exchange Volet to Perfect Money on CoinCannon with no added fees.

Exchange Volet to Perfect Money

What Do I Need to Exchange Volet (AdvCash) to Perfect Money?

To send and receive the funds, you will need verified and active AdvCash and Perfect Money accounts. Make sure that your exchange amount does not exceed the deposit and withdrawal limits.

As for CoinCannon, all you need is an email-address since no KYC (know your customer) is necessary. However, bear in mind that there are many advantages available for those who sign up on CoinCannon.

Why Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot!

Whether it’s transferring funds to others, paying for goods and services, buying cryptocurrencies, or even purchasing fiat currencies, Volet is a seriously popular payment method for online users. Additionally, it offers the capability to provide loans and issue receipts throughout the system.

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

How to Exchange Volet to Perfect Money?

  • Step 1 : Enter the Homepage on jolixo. Select Volet (AdvCash) on the left field and Perfect Money on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  • Step 2 : Click on Next and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your Perfect Money account details, Volet wallet address, email, and phone number (optional).
  • Step 3 : Click on “Next” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  • Step 4 : At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL. Click View and Check to pass this step.
  • Step 5 : Now on this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions. after the confirmation you will be lead to the next step.
  • Step 6 : Confirm Payment to transfer your AdvCash to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you.

Done!

When you finish the steps above, our team will process your order and send the Perfect Money USD to your wallet address. The transaction may take a few minutes. In the meantime, you will have a track id to follow up on your order.

Simply enter the main page and type in your track id in the specified field to see your live order status. Keep in mind that your track id is private information and you should not share it with anyone else.

The post How to Exchange Volet (AdvCash) to Perfect Money [2024 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

The post Perfect Money Review 2024 appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Every year, payments systems evolve and upgrade to keep up with the competition. In this article we will provide a Perfect Money review for 2024 to see if the e-transfer system is still relevant. But more importantly, we try to answer whether Perfect Money is actually perfect or not. With that, we have a pros and cons list to take an objective look in this Perfect Money review. On top of that, you will learn how CoinCannon can provide a safe and secure exchange platform for all your PM transfers.

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system.

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

To learn all about Perfect Money continue reading: “All About Perfect Money”

Perfect Money Voucher

It is easy, it is affordable and it is anonymous a lot like the CoinCannon Platform! The E-Voucher is the solution to some of our biggest payment problems. The electronic voucher is a method of payment that is redeemable instantly. The user pays a specific amount of funds and creates a voucher. Then, the information for the voucher can easily be delivered to the receiver and they will have the choice to redeem the payment anytime they want. Much like a gift card or a bank check, the voucher will hold the value permanently since the payment has already been made.

Although there are numerous applications for this, here are some of the common utilities:

  • You can create a voucher to make payments when you don’t have access to your Perfect Money account.
  • Perfect Money E-Voucher is a good method of payment when you don’t carry cash or traveling abroad.
  • As a service provider, users can receive vouchers if they don’t wish to reveal their account address.
  • Send your loved ones a voucher instead of a gift card

Perfect Money E-Voucher does not cost users a lot of money to make! You can simply go to CoinCannon and create your voucher immediately with the lowest fees. On top of that, unlike a majority of exchanges, CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or even a sign up process. It is truly fast and truly anonymous.

Learn how to create a Perfect Money E-Voucher

Perfect Money Review 2024

Unfortunately, Perfect Money does have some flaws and depending on the context, it could fall behind other payment systems. In that regard, you should always know the specific details about service providers. Here are some of the notable pros and cons for Perfect Money review:

Pros:

  • Instant transactions on deposit and withdrawal
  • Diversity in options for deposit and withdrawal
  • 4% interest rate per year on account
  • Assets are secure
  • Very low transaction fees

Cons:

  • Premium account is difficult to attain
  • The English language on the official website is confusing at best
  • The founder remains anonymous
  • Few online businesses support PM
  • Minimum balance of $100 and minimum wire deposit of $300
  • Certified exchange service provider can charge their own fees

Perfect Money 2023 Achievements & 2024 New Plans

Throughout the past year, Perfect Money has dedicated itself to improving its platform, with updates ranging from enhanced security features to an expanded range of payment options. The platform’s reliability and stability have been key factors in attracting new users and maintaining strong partnerships with over 400 exchange partners worldwide.

One of the highlights of the year has been the significant increase in Perfect Money’s user base, which has grown by an impressive 6 million, reaching a total of around 20 million users globally. This growth is a testament to the platform’s reputation for excellence and its ability to meet the evolving needs of its users.

In addition to expanding its user base, Perfect Money has also expanded its geographical reach, offering payment operations in over 200 countries and facilitating transactions in more than 50 fiat currencies. This broad global presence has made Perfect Money a trusted payment partner for tens of thousands of companies around the world.

Perfect Money’s commitment to customer satisfaction has also been recognized, with the platform receiving high ratings and positive feedback from users. With a rating of 4.5 out of 5 on leading review platforms and a satisfaction rate of 97% among users, Perfect Money’s dedication to providing excellent service is evident.

Looking ahead to Perfect Money 2024, it remains focused on delivering innovative financial solutions and continuing to meet the needs of its growing user base. With a team dedicated to excellence and a commitment to customer satisfaction, Perfect Money is poised for continued success in the new year.

As the year comes to a close, Perfect Money extends its warmest wishes to all its users for a joyous holiday season and a prosperous new year. Here’s to a perfect 2024!

Certified Partner: CoinCannon

As mentioned, Perfect Money certified partners can charge extra exchange fees on transactions. On top of that, they will also have access to user information hence the exchange process is not anonymous. However, CoinCannon platform eliminates both these problems and provides a perfect exchange service for the user. CoinCannon is a certified Perfect Money partner.

To begin with, CoinCannon does not charge any exchange fees on Perfect Money transactions. With that, you will be sure to pay the least amount of commission on each transaction.

As for anonymity, CoinCannon does not require KYC or sign up. So, your information will be safe and the transaction will remain anonymous.

As for the cherry on top, the platform does also provide online 24/7 customer support.

Subsequently, it is worth mentioning in this Perfect Money review that choosing the right exchange service provider is actually very important for PM users.

Did you know you can easily exchange Perfect Money to Paypal?
Learn: How to Exchange Perfect Money USD to PayPal USD [Video Guide] – Updated 2024

Conclusion, Perfect Money Review 2024

In general, Perfect Money is actually solid and good. However, the biggest downside is the small network of online businesses supporting PM. That remains to be the biggest bummer for the network. On top of that, choosing the right exchange service provider is very important but CoinCannon ticks all the right boxes for that. The Perfect Money e-voucher is actually great and has so many use cases.
